Installation¶

Dependencies¶

  • The schrondinger academic version
  • Rdkit

Env variables¶

export PELE=’/path/to/PELE/folder/’

Python Path¶

set export PATH=/path/to/PELE-1.5_mpi/:$PATH’ set export PATH=/path/to/mpirun/:$PATH’
